payment.cancel.text: We noticed you cancelled the order. If there is anything that went wrong, we would like to hear from you by replying to this e-mail. If you want to continue to proceed with the checkout, click the link below.
payment.error.text: We noticed there was an error during checkout. If there is anything that went wrong, we would like to hear from you by replying to this e-mail. If you want to continue to proceed with the checkout, click the link below.
payment.reminder.text: We want to remind you that you started a checkout in our shop. The products are still in your cart. If there is anything that went wrong, we would like to hear from you by replying to this e-mail. If you want to continue to proceed with the checkout, click the link below.
